run.name: [com.sap.mi.fwk.test.suites.MiFwkSmokeTestsCentral|non-UI] Smoke tests for MI, testing DC creation, deletion and closing.

[com.sap.mi.fwk.test.suites.MiFwkTestsCentral|non-UI] Ui free tests for MI including connection creation, inconsistency handling, file based builders, metamodel management, various adapters, model management, ocl checking, partition and query services, and various utility classes.
